com.codename1.maker

Class MakerPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.maker.MakerPlugin

  • public abstract class MakerPlugin
extends Object
    A Maker plugin allows developers to build extensions to the Codename One Maker tool, it is implemented as an abstract class to allow future extensibility.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MakerPlugin() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Container createEmbeddedUI()
      Creates a container version of the UI that will be added to the flow based on maker logic
      Form createStandaloneUI()
      Creates a standalone version of the UI that will be shown by the maker tool, notice that back functionality will be added by the maker tool and should not be incorporated into the form! The default implementation just used the embedded container version.
      String getDescription()
      The description that the user has set to this plugin
      abstract String getDeveloperEmailId()
      Returns the email for the developer used in registration to the Codename One build server
      EncodedImage getIcon()
      The icon that the user has set to this plugin
      Hashtable<String,Object> getMetaData()
      The meta data associated with the given plugin based on the definitions in the accompanying plugin descriptor file
      abstract String getPackageName()
      A unique identifier for this specific plugin
      abstract String getPluginName()
      Returns the user displayable name of the plugin
      String getTitle()
      The title that the user has set to this plugin
      void setDescription(String description)
      The description that the user has set to this plugin
      void setIcon(EncodedImage icon)
      The icon that the user has set to this plugin
      void setMetaData(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      The meta data associated with the given plugin based on the definitions in the accompanying plugin descriptor file
      void setTitle(String title)
      The title that the user has set to this plugin

      • createEmbeddedUI

        public abstract Container createEmbeddedUI()
        Creates a container version of the UI that will be added to the flow based on maker logic
        Returns:
        the embedded UI

      • createStandaloneUI

        public Form createStandaloneUI()
        Creates a standalone version of the UI that will be shown by the maker tool, notice that back functionality will be added by the maker tool and should not be incorporated into the form! The default implementation just used the embedded container version. Normally developers don't need to override this method unless they need specific behavior for a form
        Returns:
        the standalone UI
